original_title: 18 Hairpin Bends on the Kandy, Mahiyanganaya main road closed
original_body_lines: The Mahiyanganaya-Kandy main road near the 14th of the 18 Hairpin Bends (18 Wanguwa) in the Hasalaka police area had been temporarily closed due to an earthslip due to bad weather conditions, police said.
Therefore, the police requested the public to use alternative routes.

Accordingly, motorists driving from Kandy towards Mahiyanganaya can use Badulla - Mahiyanganaya road by reaching Thenne Kumbura clock tower junction and then turn right towards Randenigala Badulla road (Raja Mawatha) and then turn left at Junction 21.

Vehicles driving towards Kandy from Mahiyanganaya can come along Badulla Mahiyanganaya Road and turn right at Junction 21 to Randenigala Badulla Road (Raja Mawatha) and turn left at Thanne Kumbura Clock Tower junction to reach Kandy city.
